short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Widens and darkens the scrollbar and adds back the buttons. Uses css only.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension widens and darkens the scrollbars in chrome, and adds back the top and bottom buttons to the scrollbar. It uses browser css only.
